metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3576 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.Description:
The processControlCommand function in broker/TransportConnection.java inApache ActiveMQ before 5.11.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (shutdown) via a shutdown command.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3576` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

activemq - 5.6.0+dfsg-1+deb7u1build0.14.04.1
libactivemq-java - 5.6.0+dfsg-1+deb7u1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: activemq package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.0+dfsg-1+deb7u1build0.14.04.1').
